## booleanFormatter() function

Formatter that displays boolean values using a checkbox component. Styled to match grid-pro boolean renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function booleanFormatter<T = any>(cell: any, formatterParams?: BooleanFormatterParams<T>): string;
```

**Returns:**

string

HTML content for the boolean value
